title: Google\Cloud\DataFusion\V1\ListAvailableVersionsRequest
name: ListAvailableVersionsRequest
description:
Request message for the list available versions request.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.datafusion.v1.ListAvailableVersionsRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The project and location for which to retrieve instance information in the format projects/{project}/locations/{location}.

params.name: data.page_size
params.description: The maximum number of items to return.

params.name: data.page_token
params.description: The next_page_token value to use if there are additional results to retrieve for this list request.

params.name: data.latest_patch_only
params.description: Whether or not to return the latest patch of every available minor version. If true, only the latest patch will be returned. Ex. if allowed versions is [6.1.1, 6.1.2, 6.2.0] then response will be [6.1.2, 6.2.0]
